pageContext.claim: “The Democratic National Committee, sometimes referred to as the DNC, is again working its magic in its quest to destroy Crazy Bernie Sanders for the more traditional, but not very bright, Sleepy Joe Biden. Here we go again Bernie, but this time please show a little more anger and indignation when you get screwed!”
pageContext.analysis: The DNC changed its rules after 2016, reducing the impact of superdelegates that Sanders had complained had thwarted his quest for the nomination.
